bs-readconfirmation-column-read-at:
Label of a column in an ExtJS manager that shows the date of when an entry was read
{{Identical|Read on}}
bs-readconfirmation-not-read:
Text in an ExtJS manager column when an entry was not read
{{Identical|not read}}
bs-readconfirmation-action-remind:
Button label in an ExtJS manager column that lets the user request a read confirmation
{{Identical|Request read confirmation}}
bs-readconfirmation-action-log:
Button label in an ExtJS manager column that lets the user see the read confirmation log of the current entry
{{Identical|Read confirmation log}}
bs-readconfirmation-action-remind-confir: Confirm text in alert window, that asks the user if the user really wants to request a read confirmation
bs-readconfirmation-confirm-read-checkbo:
Label for the checkbox the user has to activate to confirm, that the user has read the page
{{Identical|Yes, I have completely read this article.}}
bs-readconfirmation-confirm-read-button-:
Label for the button the user has to klick to confirm, that the user has read the page
{{Identical|Confirm}}
bs-readconfirmation-action-apiread-check:
API description that states that this action checks the read confirmation for the given page
* $1 - name of the page the read confirmation gets checked on
bs-readconfirmation-action-apiread-remin:
API description that states that this action reminds the user to confirm that they have read the given page
* $1 - name of the page the user is reminded to give a read confirmation for
bs-readconfirmation-api-error-cant-confi: Error message when read confirmation can't be completed
bs-readconfirmation-api-error-no-page: Error message when no page was given to either check, confirm or remind the users with the api
bs-readconfirmation-api-error-no-non-min: Error message when teh given page has to revision to either check, confirm or remind the users with the api
echo-category-title-bs-readconfirmation-: Checkbox label for mail and wiki notification subscription on read confirmation
echo-pref-tooltip-bs-readconfirmation-ca: Tooltip for Echo notification category bs-readconfirmation-cat
notification-bs-readconfirmation-remind-:
Summary of the notification that states, that a user reminds the receiving user to read a page
* $1 - Name of the user, that reminds the receiving user
* $2 - Real name of the user, that reminds the receiving user
* $3 - Name of the page, the receiving user has to read confirm on

Subject of the notification that states, that a user reminds the receiving user to read a page
* $1 - Name of the user, that reminds the receiving user
* $2 Real name of the user, that reminds the receiving user
* $3 - Name of the page, the receiving user has to read confirm on

Body of the notification that states, that a user reminds the receiving user to read a page
* $1 - Name of the user, that reminds the receiving user
* $2 Real name of the user, that reminds the receiving user
* $3 - Name of the page, the receiving user has to read confirm on

Summary of the notification that reminds the receiving user to read a page
* $1 - Name of the page, the receiving user has to read confirm on

Subject of the notification that reminds the receiving user to read a page
* $1 - Name of the page, the receiving user has to read confirm on

Body of the notification that reminds the receiving user to read a page
* $1 - Name of the page, the receiving user has to read confirm on
log-name-bs-readconfirmation: Used in [[Special:Log]], headline for the read confirmation log
logeventslist-bs-readconfirmation-log: Read confirmation log option label on [[Special:Log]]
log-description-bs-readconfirmation: Used in [[Special:Log]], log description for the read confirmation log
logentry-bs-readconfirmation-confirm:
Log entry text that shows that a user has confirmed to have read a page.
* $1 - real name of the user that has confirmed to have read the page
* $2 - name of the user that has confirmed to have read the page
* $3 - name of the page that the user has confirmed to have read
logentry-bs-readconfirmation-remind:
Log entry text that shows that a user has reminded another user to confirm to have read a page.
* $1 - real name of the user that has reminded another user to confirm to have read the page
* $2 - name of the user that has reminded another user to confirm to have read the page
* $3 - name of the page that the user has reminded another user to confirm to have read
* $4 - the real name of the user that got reminded to confirm to have read to page
bs-readconfirmation-label-ns-manager:
Label for checkbox option to activate the read confirmation functionality for a specific namespace.
{{Identical|Read Confirmation}}
bs-readconfirmation-api-error-not-active: Error message when a page given that is in a namespace in wich read Confirmation is not enabled
bs-readconfirmation-disabled-ns: Text in an ExtJS manager column when an entry is in a namespace in wich read confirmation is not enabled
bs-readconfirmation-disabled-ns-short:
Short text in an ExtJS manager column when an entry is in a namespace in wich read confirmation is not enabled.
{{Identical|Disabled}}
bs-readconfirmation-navigation-link-titl: Link title for the overview of all pending read confirmations
bs-readconfirmation-navigation-link-text:
Link text for the overview of all pending read confirmations.
{{Identical|Requested read confirmations}}
bs-readconfirmation-graphicallist-btn-re:
Link title that leads to the page that the user must confirm to have read
{{Identical|Read}}
bs-readconfirmation-privacy-transparency:
Message for item in BlueSpicePrivacy when exporting user's pages that the user confirmed to have read.
* $1 - name of the page the user has confirmed to have read
* $2 - the revision number the user has confirmed to have read
* $3 - the date of the users confirmaion to have read the page
bs-readconfirmation-logentry-confirm-suf:
Suffix to be appended to the entry on [[Special:Log]] when a revision information is available
* $1 - a formatted timestamp
bs-readconfirmation-uto-task-header: Header message for read confirmation user task in UnifiedTaskOverview
bs-readconfirmation-uto-task-body-diff: Body message for read confirmation user task in UnifiedTaskOverview in case when there are some changes since the latest read revision
bs-readconfirmation-confirm-read-aria-de: Aria descriptionto inform about requested read confirmation
